concept.title: Directory
concept.shortdesc: The Directory origin reads data from files in a directory. The file names must all share a file name pattern.

conbody.p: Directory originovervieworiginsDirectoryWhen you configure Directory, you define the directory to use, the file name pattern, and the first file to process. These properties determine the files that Directory processes. After processing a file, Directory can keep, archive, or delete the file.

When the pipeline stops, Directory notes where it stops reading. When the pipeline starts again, Directory continues processing from where it stopped by default. You can reset the origin to process all requested files.
